data.title: Quantitative Finance Track - B.S. in Commerce
data.meta_description: The McIntire School of Commerce is regarded as one of the nation’s finest business schools, offering world-class programs at the undergraduate, graduate, and certificate levels. Students may choose to concentrate in Finance, Accounting, Marketing, Management, or Information Technology.
data.meta_site_name: University of Virginia McIntire School of Commerce
data.text:
In addition to the lifelong benefits that come from an innovative McIntire business education, Commerce School students enjoy an enhanced UVA experience on Grounds and around the globe. From insightful student services that help connect you with your passion to specialized career support that provides real-world employment opportunities, there are countless ways to make the most of your present while investing in your future.

We’ve designed the Quantitative Finance Track to prepare students for quantitatively focused careers in finance. You will gain a better understanding of model-based decision making using tools from a variety of areas such as economics, operations research, statistics, computer science, and information technology.

Select this track if you’re interested in a career in asset/investment management, sales/trading, risk management/compliance, or fintech.

Eligibility

All Commerce students whose academic requirements allow the flexibility to take the required 12 credit hours may apply to the Qualitative Finance Track.

McIntire’s Office of Undergraduate Admission collaborates with prospective B.S. in Commerce students, helping in a variety of ways.

We encourage prospective students to contact us early in the admissions process to take advantage of all of our advising opportunities, including academic advising, information sessions, and other events, or to connect with a student ambassador.
